txt.en: 'Since your attack on the fields, the goblin riders have pulled back some of their forces to the half-orc encampment to the north-east of here.\n\n'We cannot allow them to regroup and set siege upon our crofts again. Track them and run them down. Go with haste!'

'Excellent! Their defences are sufficiently weakened now...my men and I will handle this ourselves. These horrid foes will be driven from our lands!\n\n'As for you, my father wishes to speak about another matter.'
Gísling has noticed more mounted goblins circling Garsfeld and hopes that you can dispatch them before they are able to launch a full attack upon the town.
Goblin riders can be found circling the half-orc camp, Krash-bálum, to the north-east of Garsfeld.\n\nGísling asked you to hunt down the goblin riders which have been raiding the crofts.
Talk to Gísling at the Mead Hall of Garsfeld
Gísling can be found inside the Mead Hall of Garsfeld, south-west of Krash-bálum.\n\nYou should return to Gísling with news of your victory.
